'''Sublime Crane Feather Strings''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The furnishing is sent in the mail after redeeming a [[Genshin Concert/2023 Melodies of an Endless Journey|Genshin Concert 2023 Melodies of an Endless Journey]] item reward card.

==Trivia==
* The zither plays three melodies present in the soundtrack ''[[Tipsy Poetry]]'' from the album ''[[The Shimmering Voyage Vol. 3]]''.
